entities.description: The location where alcohol was consumed, specifically at school.
The location where alcohol was consumed, specifically at another place.
The type of response entered by the survey participant.
Indicates that the participant has never used alcohol.
Indicates that the participant did not use alcohol in the past 30 days.
The location where the participant last drank alcohol, which could be various places.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the location where alcohol was consumed at school.
Relates the respondent to the location where alcohol was consumed at another place.
Relates the survey question to the type of response entered.
Categorizes the participant who has never used alcohol.
Categorizes the participant who did not use alcohol in the past 30 days.
Relates the survey question to the location where the participant last drank alcohol.
